means: 自我毁灭的，自取灭亡的

sentence.Network_en: In dealing with suicidal youngsters, our aims should be clear.
sentence.Network_cn: 在对待有自杀倾向的青少年时，我们的目标应当很明确。

sentence.Network_en: He grew suicidal, thinking up ways to end it all.
sentence.Network_cn: 他萌生了自杀的念头，想出各种自我了断的办法。

sentence.Network_en: Her suicidal tendencies continued for several more weeks.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的自杀倾向又持续了几周。

entry.tran: 有自杀倾向的;想自杀的
entry.def: People who are suicidal want to kill themselves.

example.ex: I was suicidal and just couldn't stop crying...
example.tran: 我当时想自杀，一直哭个不停。

example.ex: Her suicidal tendencies continued for several more weeks.
example.tran: 她的自杀倾向又持续了几周。

entry.tran: 自取灭亡的;有致命危险的
entry.def: If you describe an action or behaviour as suicidal, you mean that it is very dangerous.

example.ex: They realized it would be suicidal to resist in the face of overwhelming military superiority.
example.tran: 他们意识到面对力量相差如此悬殊的军队，抵抗无异于自取灭亡。

example.ex: ...the suicidal bicycle rickshaws of New Delhi.
example.tran: 新德里非常危险的人力车

means.word_mean: 1. dangerous to yourself or your interests;

auth_sentence.content: If you feel suicidal, keep this in mind.

auth_sentence.content: There are also the "suicidal" animals cited.

sentences.en: He became very depressed and even got suicidal at one point.
sentences.cn: 他变得十分消沉，甚至一度想自杀。

sentences.en: There is medical evidence to show that he is suicidal and clinically depressed.
sentences.cn: 医学证据表明他有自杀倾向而且临床诊断为抑郁。

sentences.en: Counsellors are used to dealing with suicidal people.
sentences.cn: 心理问题咨询人员惯于同有自杀倾向的人打交道。

sentences.en: a move which would be politically suicidal
sentences.cn: 政治上自我毀灭的举动
